When Jesus<S>2424</S> had spoken<S>2036</S> these words<S>5023</S>, he went forth<S>1831</S> with<S>4862</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> over<S>4008</S> the brook<S>5493</S> Cedron<S>2748</S>, where<S>3699</S> was<S>2258</S> a garden<S>2779</S>, into<S>1519</S> the which<S>3739</S> he<S>846</S> entered<S>1525</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Judas<S>2455</S> also<S>2532</S>, which<S>3588</S> betrayed<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S>, knew<S>1492</S> the place<S>5117</S>: for<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> ofttimes<S>4178</S> resorted<S>4863</S> thither<S>1563</S> with<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>.
Judas<S>2455</S> then<S>3767</S>, having received<S>2983</S> a band<S>4686</S> of men and<S>2532</S> officers<S>5257</S> from<S>1537</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> and<S>2532</S> Pharisees<S>5330</S>, cometh<S>2064</S> thither<S>1563</S> with<S>3326</S> lanterns<S>5322</S> and<S>2532</S> torches<S>2985</S> and<S>2532</S> weapons<S>3696</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, knowing<S>1492</S> all things<S>3956</S> that should come<S>2064</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>, went forth<S>1831</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Whom<S>5101</S> seek ye<S>2212</S>?
They answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> of Nazareth<S>3480</S>. Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he. And<S>1161</S> Judas<S>2455</S> also<S>2532</S>, which<S>3588</S> betrayed<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S>, stood<S>2476</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>.
As soon<S>5613</S> then<S>3767</S> as he had said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he, they went<S>565</S> backward<S>1519</S> <S>3694</S>, and<S>2532</S> fell<S>4098</S> to the ground<S>5476</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> asked he<S>1905</S> them<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S>, Whom<S>5101</S> seek ye<S>2212</S>? And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> of Nazareth<S>3480</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, I have told<S>2036</S> you<S>5213</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he: if<S>1487</S> therefore<S>3767</S> ye seek<S>2212</S> me<S>1691</S>, let<S>863</S> these<S>5128</S> go their way<S>5217</S>:
That<S>2443</S> the saying<S>3056</S> might be fulfilled<S>4137</S>, which<S>3739</S> he spake<S>2036</S>,<S>3754</S> Of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> which<S>3739</S> thou gavest<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S> have I<S>3756</S> lost<S>622</S> none<S>3762</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> having<S>2192</S> a sword<S>3162</S> drew<S>1670</S> it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> smote<S>3817</S> the high priest's<S>749</S> servant<S>1401</S>, and<S>2532</S> cut off<S>609</S> his<S>846</S> right<S>1188</S> ear<S>5621</S>.<S>1161</S> The servant's<S>1401</S> name<S>3686</S> was<S>2258</S> Malchus<S>3124</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto Peter<S>4074</S>, Put up<S>906</S> thy<S>4675</S> sword<S>3162</S> into<S>1519</S> the sheath<S>2336</S>: the cup<S>4221</S> which<S>3739</S> my Father<S>3962</S> hath given<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S>, shall I<S>4095</S> not<S>3378</S> drink<S>4095</S> it<S>846</S>?
Then<S>3767</S> the band<S>4686</S> and<S>2532</S> the captain<S>5506</S> and<S>2532</S> officers<S>5257</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S> took<S>4815</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> bound<S>1210</S> him<S>846</S>,
And<S>2532</S> led<S>520</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>520</S> to<S>4314</S> Annas<S>452</S> first<S>4412</S>; for<S>1063</S> he was<S>2258</S> father in law<S>3995</S> to Caiaphas<S>2533</S>, which<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S> the high priest<S>749</S> that same<S>1565</S> year<S>1763</S>. <sup>year: year. And Annas sent Christ bound unto Caiaphas the high priest</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> Caiaphas<S>2533</S> was he<S>2258</S>, which<S>3588</S> gave counsel<S>4823</S> to the Jews<S>2453</S>, that<S>3754</S> it was expedient<S>4851</S> that one<S>1520</S> man<S>444</S> should die<S>622</S> for<S>5228</S> the people<S>2992</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> followed<S>190</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> so did another<S>243</S> disciple<S>3101</S>:<S>1161</S> that<S>1565</S> disciple<S>3101</S> was<S>2258</S> known<S>1110</S> unto the high priest<S>749</S>, and<S>2532</S> went in with<S>4897</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> into<S>1519</S> the palace<S>833</S> of the high priest<S>749</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> stood<S>2476</S> at<S>4314</S> the door<S>2374</S> without<S>1854</S>. Then<S>3767</S> went out<S>1831</S> that other<S>243</S> disciple<S>3101</S>, which<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S> known<S>1110</S> unto the high priest<S>749</S>, and<S>2532</S> spake<S>2036</S> unto her that kept the door<S>2377</S>, and<S>2532</S> brought in<S>1521</S> Peter<S>4074</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> saith<S>3004</S> the damsel<S>3814</S> that kept the door<S>2377</S> unto Peter<S>4074</S>, Art<S>1488</S> not<S>3361</S> thou<S>4771</S> also<S>2532</S> one of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> man's<S>444</S> disciples<S>3101</S>? He<S>1565</S> saith<S>3004</S>, I am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the servants<S>1401</S> and<S>2532</S> officers<S>5257</S> stood there<S>2476</S>, who had made<S>4160</S> a fire of coals<S>439</S>; for<S>3754</S> it was<S>2258</S> cold<S>5592</S>: and<S>2532</S> they warmed themselves<S>2328</S>: and<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> stood<S>2258</S> <S>2476</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> warmed himself<S>2328</S>.
The high priest<S>749</S> then<S>3767</S> asked<S>2065</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> of<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, and<S>2532</S> of<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> spake<S>2980</S> openly<S>3954</S> to the world<S>2889</S>; I<S>1473</S> ever<S>3842</S> taught<S>1321</S> in<S>1722</S> the synagogue<S>4864</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, whither<S>3699</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> always<S>3842</S> resort<S>4905</S>; and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S> have I said<S>2980</S> nothing<S>3762</S>.
Why<S>5101</S> askest thou<S>1905</S> me<S>3165</S>? ask<S>1905</S> them which heard me<S>191</S>, what<S>5101</S> I have said<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S>: behold<S>2396</S>, they<S>3778</S> know<S>1492</S> what<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> said<S>2036</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when he<S>846</S> had<S>2036</S> thus<S>5023</S> spoken<S>2036</S>, one<S>1520</S> of the officers<S>5257</S> which stood by<S>3936</S> struck<S>1325</S> <S>4475</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> with the palm of his hand<S>1325</S> <S>4475</S>, saying<S>2036</S>, Answerest thou<S>611</S> the high priest<S>749</S> so<S>3779</S>? <sup>with: or, with a rod</sup>
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> I have spoken<S>2980</S> evil<S>2560</S>, bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> the evil<S>2556</S>: but<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> well<S>2573</S>, why<S>5101</S> smitest<S>1194</S> thou me<S>3165</S>?
Now Annas<S>452</S> had sent<S>649</S> him<S>846</S> bound<S>1210</S> unto<S>4314</S> Caiaphas<S>2533</S> the high priest<S>749</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> stood<S>2258</S> <S>2476</S> and<S>2532</S> warmed himself<S>2328</S>. They said<S>2036</S> therefore<S>3767</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Art<S>1488</S> not<S>3361</S> thou<S>4771</S> also<S>2532</S> one of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>? He<S>1565</S> denied<S>720</S> it, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, I am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S>.
One<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the servants<S>1401</S> of the high priest<S>749</S>, being<S>5607</S> his kinsman<S>4773</S> whose<S>3739</S> ear<S>5621</S> Peter<S>4074</S> cut off<S>609</S>, saith<S>3004</S>, Did<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> I<S>1473</S> see<S>1492</S> thee<S>4571</S> in<S>1722</S> the garden<S>2779</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>?
Peter<S>4074</S> then<S>3767</S> denied<S>720</S> again<S>3825</S>: and<S>2532</S> immediately<S>2112</S> the cock<S>220</S> crew<S>5455</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> led they<S>71</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> from<S>575</S> Caiaphas<S>2533</S> unto<S>1519</S> the hall of judgment<S>4232</S>: and<S>1161</S> it was<S>2258</S> early<S>4405</S>; and<S>2532</S> they themselves<S>846</S> went<S>1525</S> not<S>3756</S> into<S>1519</S> the judgment hall<S>4232</S>, lest<S>3363</S> they should be defiled<S>3392</S>; but<S>235</S> that<S>2443</S> they might eat<S>5315</S> the passover<S>3957</S>. <sup>the hall: or, Pilate's house</sup>
Pilate<S>4091</S> then<S>3767</S> went out<S>1831</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, What<S>5101</S> accusation<S>2724</S> bring ye<S>5342</S> against<S>2596</S> this<S>5127</S> man<S>444</S>?
They answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, If<S>1508</S> he<S>3778</S> were<S>2258</S> not<S>1508</S> a malefactor<S>2555</S>, we would<S>302</S> not<S>3756</S> have delivered<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>3860</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Take<S>2983</S> ye<S>5210</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> judge<S>2919</S> him<S>846</S> according<S>2596</S> to your<S>5216</S> law<S>3551</S>. The Jews<S>2453</S> therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, It is<S>1832</S> not<S>3756</S> lawful<S>1832</S> for us<S>2254</S> to put<S>615</S> any man<S>3762</S> to death<S>615</S>:
That<S>2443</S> the saying<S>3056</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> might be fulfilled<S>4137</S>, which<S>3739</S> he spake<S>2036</S>, signifying<S>4591</S> what<S>4169</S> death<S>2288</S> he should<S>3195</S> die<S>599</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the judgment hall<S>4232</S> again<S>3825</S>, and<S>2532</S> called<S>5455</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> the King<S>935</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, Sayest<S>3004</S> thou<S>4771</S> this thing<S>5124</S> of<S>575</S> thyself<S>1438</S>, or<S>2228</S> did others<S>243</S> tell it<S>2036</S> thee<S>4671</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>?
Pilate<S>4091</S> answered<S>611</S>,<S>3385</S> Am<S>1510</S> I<S>1473</S> a Jew<S>2453</S>? Thine own<S>4674</S> nation<S>1484</S> and<S>2532</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> have delivered<S>3860</S> thee<S>4571</S> unto me<S>1698</S>: what<S>5101</S> hast thou done<S>4160</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, My<S>1699</S> kingdom<S>932</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>: if<S>1487</S> my<S>1699</S> kingdom<S>932</S> were<S>2258</S> of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>, then would<S>302</S> my<S>1699</S> servants<S>5257</S> fight<S>75</S>, that<S>3363</S> I should<S>3860</S> not<S>3363</S> be delivered<S>3860</S> to the Jews<S>2453</S>: but<S>1161</S> now<S>3568</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>1699</S> kingdom<S>932</S> not<S>3756</S> from hence<S>1782</S>.
Pilate<S>4091</S> therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> a king<S>935</S> then<S>3766</S>? Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> sayest<S>3004</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> a king<S>935</S>. To<S>1519</S> this<S>5124</S> end was<S>1080</S> I<S>1473</S> born<S>1080</S>, and<S>2532</S> for<S>1519</S> this<S>5124</S> cause came I<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>, that<S>2443</S> I should bear witness<S>3140</S> unto the truth<S>225</S>. Every one<S>3956</S> that is<S>5607</S> of<S>1537</S> the truth<S>225</S> heareth<S>191</S> my<S>3450</S> voice<S>5456</S>.
Pilate<S>4091</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> truth<S>225</S>? And<S>2532</S> when he had said<S>2036</S> this<S>5124</S>, he went out<S>1831</S> again<S>3825</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> find<S>2147</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> no<S>3762</S> fault<S>156</S> at all.
But<S>1161</S> ye<S>5213</S> have<S>2076</S> a custom<S>4914</S>, that<S>2443</S> I should release<S>630</S> unto you<S>5213</S> one<S>1520</S> at<S>1722</S> the passover<S>3957</S>: will ye<S>1014</S> therefore<S>3767</S> that I release<S>630</S> unto you<S>5213</S> the King<S>935</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>?
Then<S>3767</S> cried they<S>2905</S> all<S>3956</S> again<S>3825</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Not<S>3361</S> this man<S>5126</S>, but<S>235</S> Barabbas<S>912</S>. Now<S>1161</S> Barabbas<S>912</S> was<S>2258</S> a robber<S>3027</S>.
